                 `bcd_adder` Interface                  
                                                        
| Name   | Width   | I/O      | Functional Description |
|--------|---------|----------|------------------------|
| `a`    | `[3:0]` | `input`  |                        |
| `b`    | `[3:0]` | `input`  |                        |
| `cin`  | `1`     | `input`  |                        |
| `sum`  | `[3:0]` | `output` |                        |
| `cout` | `1`     | `output` |                        |
